root.tf_title: Welcome to Street Science BX Auto Club!

top_section.title: Featured ride of the week!
top_section.copy: The featured ride of the week is Nox's Sentra SE-R Spec-V. This car is currently undergoing modifications that may make it the car to talk about in Street Science
